channel.title: Logout button doesn't work!

item.title: Logout button doesn't work!
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

//logoutButton = true;

See that line in the logout() method? (hint, look at the bottom) Try removing the two comment out symbols which are the // and then save and compile.

It should look like,

logoutButton = true;

The // symbols represent a comment line, when this happens, the compiler ignores anything on the line with a beginning //. In this case, it would have ignored the logoutButton variable.

Read full topic

item.title: Logout button doesn't work!
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

well my logout button doesn’t work! i can click on it like 15 times but it don’t log me out.

logout code:

public void logout() { killMyNPCs(); if (inCombat) { } if (validClient(duel_with) && duelFight) { getClient(duel_with).DuelVictory(); } else { declineDuel(); } if(inPitsGame){ inPitsGame = false; PlayerHandler.playersInPit -= 1; println_debug(playerName + " resetted pits!"); } resetfollowers(); savegame(true); outStream.createFrame(109); //logoutButton = true; }

Read full topic
